record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H13978]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 3915 and to insert extraneous material.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
